p: n-Hexane (99%), l-borneol (97%), xanthoxylin (97%) and 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH, 95%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Shanghai, China). β-carotene was purchased from Fluka Chemie (Buchs, Switzerland). Thiobarbituric acid, anhydrous Na 2SO 4, and all of the applied solvents (analysis purity) were purchased from Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co. Ltd. (Shanghai, China). For Linear retention indices (RIs) determination, a hydrocarbon mixture (C 8–C 30 n-alkanes) purchased from Supelco (Ballefonte, USA) was used to perform in the same condition as real sample determination.
